alert.note: Alert for Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 4:52PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL TODD COUNTY THROUGH 530 PM CDT... At 452 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Lake Osakis, or 14 miles northeast of Alexandria, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Long Prairie, Browerville, Clarissa, Eagle Bend, and Clotho. This includes U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 187 and 204. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
